info.name: Workflowy Colored Underlines
info.description: Adds colored underlines to items with #error/#warning/#info, #bad/#good, #incorrect/#correct, #wrong/#right, #no/#yes.
info.additionalInfo: This is inspired by styles from frankman777. Requires Tampermonkey script "Workflowy Styleable Tags" originally found on Dropbox (backup on Google Drive). See full instructions and other styles here.
